mapper.select: SELECT TEMP.FUND_ID AS fundId, sfi.full_name AS fundFullName, sfs.SIGNOFF_1 AS FIC FROM ( SELECT SAD.FUND_ID FROM wp_sa_detail SAD WHERE 1 = 1 AND SAD. STATUS = 'Y' AND SAD.PERIOD = #{period} AND SAD.FIRM_CODE = #{firmCode} GROUP BY SAD.FUND_ID ) TEMP INNER JOIN sys_fund_info sfi ON sfi.FUND_ID = TEMP.FUND_ID LEFT JOIN sys_fund_signoff sfs on sfs.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND sfs.period = #{period} ORDER BY TEMP.FUND_ID

SELECT LRA.LRAS, LRA.JSBFJ, LRA.CCBZJ, LRA.YSQSK, LRA.YSGL, LRA.YSSGK, LRA.QTZC, LRA.YFQSK, LRA.YFSHK, LRA.YFLR, LRA.QTFZ, LRA.WFPLR, LRA.GLF, LRA.LXSR, LRA.HDSY, LRA.QTSR, LRA.QTFY FROM SYS_SA_LRA_SUMMARY LRA

SELECT SAD.SEQ as seq, SAD.ITEM as item, SAD.AMOUNT as amount, SAD.RISK as risk, SAD.SCHANGE as schange, SAD.CONCERN as concern, SAD.PROPERTY as property, SAD.UTRANSACTION as utransaction FROM wp_sa_detail SAD WHERE 1 = 1 AND SAD. STATUS = 'Y' AND SAD.PERIOD = #{period} AND SAD.FIRM_CODE = #{firmCode} AND SAD.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND SAD.AFS_CODE != 'TE' ORDER BY SAD.SEQ
